title: Welsh leek and potato soup
ingredients: ['55g salted butter', '1/2 onion, sliced', '1 clove garlic, minced', '6 potaotes, peeled and diced', '3 large leeks, sliced', '300ml vegetable stock', '150ml double cream', '100g grated Cheddar cheese', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'fresh parsley, to taste']
